metadata.title: CVE-2016-9558 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
(1) libdwarf/dwarf_leb.c and (2) dwarfdump/print_frames.c in libdwarfbefore 20161124 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via acrafted bit pattern in a signed leb number, aka a "negation overflow."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9558` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20161124-1
libdwarf1 - 20161124-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161124-1').
